A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The WORST star wars yet! The story is excruciatingly long\, and NOTHING happens. The plot is boring and there are no duels whatsoever. All of the hype leading up to this movie is for nothing as major reveals turn out to be flat-out disappointing. After suffering through it all\, the end of the movie actually makes the movie go from bad to worse. This makes AOTC look like a masterpiece.
